titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: s1: April 1st <*> understand (0.25) 0.50 s2: May 1st. <*> the Magnificen (Bordeur / Bardur) s5: Nov 16 <*> (Oscavatwins? Observations?)

body.ab:
1926. MURRAY March 23 Mr John Murray 20 rue Servandoni
1m 2 vols 20 _______ Deposit 40 + 60. extras to be deducted from deposit after subscription is finished March 23. Oscar Wilde in 2 vols. March 24 Am. Mercury 1f per day (owes 1.00) to be deducted from dep at end of subsc.)
